ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; Intel Quad Core i7-4702MQ (2.2GHz-3.2GHz Turbo) 4th Gen Haswell Series Processor
15.6" diagonal LED-backlit HD anti-glare display (1366 x 768); 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz PC3-12800 RAM (2 Dimm)
750GB 5400RPM SATA III Hard Drive; Intel IrisTM HD 4600 Graphics; Rambo DVD+/-RW; Fingerprint Reader
802.11b/g/n; Gigabit Ethernet; Webcam; 3 x USB 3.0; USB 2.0; 6-Cell 48 Wh Li-Ion Battery (Up to 6.2 hours)
Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Numeric Keypad; Dolby Audio V2; HDMI; VGA; 1 Year Lenovo Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo ThinkPad Edge E540 20C6008QUS Quad Core 15.6" Windows 7 Professional Business Notebook PC (Intel Core i7-4702MQ 2.2GHz, 750GB 5400RPM Hard Drive, Windows 7 PRO Laptop, 8GB RAM)
